item.title: Man kills pregnant daughter-in-law over dispute in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Man kills pregnant daughter-in-law over dispute in Raichur
Vartha Bharati | 29-01-2026 | 15:55:00 IST
Raichur: A shocking incident was reported from Anagi village in Sirwar taluk of Raichur district, where a four-month pregnant woman was allegedly killed by her father-in-law following a family dispute.
The victim has been identified as Rekha (25). According to police, the accused, Siddappa, allegedly attacked his daughter-in-law with a knife and slit her throat during a quarrel at home. D...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
